mapper.update: UPDATE MPOMNG_MOBILE_MER_INF CUST_NAME = #{custName}, CUST_TYPE = #{custType}, CUST_LOGIN = #{custLogin}, CUST_PWD = #{custPwd}, PAYPWD_STRENGTH = #{payPwdStrength}, USR_EMAIL = #{usrEmail}, USR_ADDRESS = #{usrAddress}, USR_GENDER = #{usrGender}, USR_ZIP = #{usrZip}, USR_TEL = #{usrTel}, USR_MOBILE = #{usrMobile}, USR_BIRTHDAY = #{usrBirthday}, USR_RANDOM = #{usrRandom}, IS_LOGIN_FLAG = #{isLoginFlag}, LAST_OPER_TIME = #{lastOperTime}, AUTH_STATUS = #{authStatus}, CUST_REG_DATETIME = #{custRegDateTime}, CUST_PWD_NUM = #{custPwdNum}, RES_FIELD1 = #{payPwdStrength}, RATE_TCAS = #{rateTCas}, RATE_HOLIDAY_TCAS = #{rateHolidayTCas}, RES_FIELD2 = #{resField1}, RES_FIELD3 = #{resField2}, RES_FIELD3 = #{resField3}, MERCLASS = #{merClass}, MAX_TCAS = #{maxTCas} WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MPOMNG_MOBILE_MER_INF T1 LEFT JOIN MPAMNG_TERMINAL_INF A ON (T1.CUST_ID=A.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN MPAMNG_AGENT_INF B ON (A.AGENT_ID=B.AGENT_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROVINCE T2 ON(T1.PROVINCE_ID=T2.PROVINCE_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN CITY T3 ON(T1.CITY_ID=T3.CITY_ID) AND B.AGENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{agentName},'%') AND T1.CUST_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custName},'%') AND T1.CUST_TYPE = #{custType} AND T1.CUST_LOGIN = #{custLogin} AND T1.CUST_STATUS = #{custStatus} AND B.AGENT_CODE LIKE CONCAT((SELECT AGENT_CODE FROM MPAMNG_AGENT_INF WHERE AGENT_ID=#{agentId}), '%')

SELECT B.AGENT_ID, B.AGENT_NAME, T1.CUST_ID , T1.CUST_NAME, T1.CUST_TYPE, T1.CUST_LOGIN, T1.CUST_PWD, T1.PAYPWD_STRENGTH, T1.USR_EMAIL, T1.ACTIV_CODE, T1.USR_ADDRESS, T2.PROVINCE_NAME AS PROVINCE, T3.CITY_NAME AS CITY, T1.REGION_ID, T1.USR_GENDER, T1.USR_ZIP, T1.USR_TEL, T1.USR_MOBILE, T1.USR_BIRTHDAY, T1.USR_RANDOM, T1.IS_LOGIN_FLAG, T1.LAST_OPER_TIME, T1.CUST_REG_DATETIME, T1.CUST_STATUS, T1.CUST_PWD_NUM, T1.MERCLASS, T1.RES_FIELD1, T1.RES_FIELD2, T1.RES_FIELD3, T1.AUTH_STATUS, T1.REFERRER FROM MPOMNG_MOBILE_MER_INF T1 LEFT JOIN MPAMNG_TERMINAL_INF A ON (T1.CUST_ID=A.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN MPAMNG_AGENT_INF B ON (A.AGENT_ID=B.AGENT_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROVINCE T2 ON(T1.PROVINCE_ID=T2.PROVINCE_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN CITY T3 ON(T1.CITY_ID=T3.CITY_ID) AND B.AGENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{agentName},'%') AND T1.CUST_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custName},'%') AND T1.CUST_TYPE = #{custType} AND T1.AUTH_STATUS = #{authStatus} AND T1.CUST_LOGIN = #{custLogin} AND T1.CUST_STATUS = #{custStatus} AND B.AGENT_CODE LIKE CONCAT((SELECT AGENT_CODE FROM MPAMNG_AGENT_INF WHERE AGENT_ID=#{agentId}), '%') ORDER BY T1.CUST_ID DESC LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}

SELECT B.AGENT_ID, B.AGENT_NAME, T4.CERTIFICATE_TYPE, T4.CERTIFICATE_NO, T1.CUST_ID , T1.CUST_NAME, T1.CUST_TYPE, T1.CUST_LOGIN, T1.CUST_PWD, T1.PAYPWD_STRENGTH, T1.USR_EMAIL, T1.ACTIV_CODE, T1.USR_ADDRESS, T2.PROVINCE_NAME AS PROVINCE, T3.CITY_NAME AS CITY, T1.REGION_ID, T1.USR_GENDER, T1.USR_ZIP, T1.USR_TEL, T1.USR_MOBILE, T1.USR_BIRTHDAY, T1.USR_RANDOM, T1.IS_LOGIN_FLAG, T1.LAST_OPER_TIME, T1.CUST_REG_DATETIME, T1.CUST_STATUS, T1.CUST_PWD_NUM, T1.MERCLASS, T1.RATE_TCAS, T1.RES_FIELD1, T1.RES_FIELD2, T1.RES_FIELD3, T1.AUTH_STATUS, T4.IDENTIFY_TIME, T1.REFERRER, T1.MAX_TCAS FROM MPOMNG_MOBILE_MER_INF T1 LEFT JOIN MPOMNG_MERIDENTIFY_INF T4 ON (T1.CUST_ID=T4.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN MPOMNG_AGE_CUST_REF_INF A ON (T1.CUST_ID=A.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN MPAMNG_AGENT_INF B ON (A.AGE_ID=B.AGENT_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROVINCE T2 ON(T1.PROVINCE_ID=T2.PROVINCE_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN CITY T3 ON(T1.CITY_ID=T3.CITY_ID) AND T1.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND T1.CUST_LOGIN =#{custLogin} AND B.AGENT_ID =#{agentId} GROUP BY T1.CUST_ID
SELECT CUST_ID FROM MPOMNG_MOBILE_MER_INF WHERE CUST_LOGIN = #{custLogin}

SELECT B.AGENT_ID, B.AGENT_NAME, B.RATE_LIVELIHOOD, B.RATE_GENERAL, B.RATE_GENERAL_TOP, B.RATE_GENERAL_MAXIMUN, B.RATE_ENTERTAIN, B.RATE_ENTERTAIN_TOP, B.RATE_ENTERTAIN_MAXIMUN, T4.CERTIFICATE_TYPE, T4.CERTIFICATE_NO, T1.CUST_ID , T1.CUST_NAME, T1.CUST_TYPE, T1.CUST_LOGIN, T1.CUST_PWD, T1.PAYPWD_STRENGTH, T1.USR_EMAIL, T1.ACTIV_CODE, T1.USR_ADDRESS, T2.PROVINCE_NAME AS PROVINCE, T3.CITY_NAME AS CITY, T1.REGION_ID, T1.USR_GENDER, T1.USR_ZIP, T1.USR_TEL, T1.USR_MOBILE, T1.USR_BIRTHDAY, T1.USR_RANDOM, T1.IS_LOGIN_FLAG, T1.LAST_OPER_TIME, T1.CUST_REG_DATETIME, T1.CUST_STATUS, T1.CUST_PWD_NUM, T1.RATE_TCAS, T5.LEVEL_NAME AS MERCLASS, T1.RES_FIELD1, T1.RES_FIELD2, T1.RES_FIELD3, T1.AUTH_STATUS, T1.REFERRER, T4.CERTIFICATE_NO, T4.IDENTIFY_TIME, BANK.CARD_NO FROM MPOMNG_MOBILE_MER_INF T1 LEFT JOIN MPOMNG_MERIDENTIFY_INF T4 ON (T1.CUST_ID=T4.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN MPOMNG_CUST_BANK_INF BANK ON (T1.CUST_ID=BANK.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN MPOMNG_AGE_CUST_REF_INF A ON (T1.CUST_ID=A.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN MPAMNG_AGENT_INF B ON (A.AGE_ID=B.AGENT_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROVINCE T2 ON(T1.PROVINCE_ID=T2.PROVINCE_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN CITY T3 ON(T1.CITY_ID=T3.CITY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN MPRCS_CUST_LEVEL_INF T5 ON(T1.MERCLASS=T5.LEVEL) AND T1.CUST_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custName},'%') AND T1.CUST_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custId},'%') AND T1.USR_MOBILE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custLogin},'%') AND B.AGENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{agentName},'%') AND T1.CUST_STATUS = #{custStatus} AND T1.CUST_REG_DATETIME >= #{startTime} AND T1.CUST_REG_DATETIME <= #{endTime} AND T1.IS_LOGIN_FLAG = #{isLoginFlag} AND T1.AUTH_STATUS = #{authStatus} AND B.AGENT_CODE LIKE CONCAT((SELECT AGENT_CODE FROM MPAMNG_AGENT_INF WHERE AGENT_ID=#{agentId}),'%') GROUP BY T1.CUST_ID ORDER BY T1.CUST_ID DESC LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MPOMNG_MOBILE_MER_INF T1 LEFT JOIN MPOMNG_AGE_CUST_REF_INF A ON (T1.CUST_ID=A.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN MPAMNG_AGENT_INF B ON (A.AGE_ID=B.AGENT_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN MPOMNG_MERIDENTIFY_INF I ON (T1.CUST_ID=I.CUST_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROVINCE T2 ON(T1.PROVINCE_ID=T2.PROVINCE_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN CITY T3 ON(T1.CITY_ID=T3.CITY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN MPRCS_CUST_LEVEL_INF T5 ON(T1.MERCLASS=T5.LEVEL) AND T1.CUST_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custName},'%') AND T1.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND T1.USR_MOBILE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custLogin},'%') AND B.AGENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{agentName},'%') AND T1.CUST_STATUS = #{custStatus} AND T1.CUST_REG_DATETIME >= #{startTime} AND T1.CUST_REG_DATETIME <= #{endTime} AND T1.IS_LOGIN_FLAG = #{isLoginFlag} AND T1.AUTH_STATUS = #{authStatus} AND B.AGENT_CODE LIKE CONCAT((SELECT AGENT_CODE FROM MPAMNG_AGENT_INF WHERE AGENT_ID=#{agentId}),'%')

SELECT M1.CUST_ID, M1.CUST_NAME, M1.CUST_TYPE, M6.AGENT_NAME, M6.AGENT_ID, M4.CERTIFICATE_NO, M1.CUST_LOGIN, M1.USR_EMAIL, M1.ACTIV_CODE, M1.USR_GENDER, M1.USR_ZIP, M1.USR_TEL, M1.USR_MOBILE, M1.USR_BIRTHDAY, M1.IS_LOGIN_FLAG, M1.CUST_STATUS, M1.LAST_OPER_TIME, M1.CUST_REG_DATETIME, M5.LEVEL_NAME AS MERCLASS, M2.PROVINCE_NAME AS PROVINCE, M3.CITY_NAME AS CITY, M1.REGION_ID AS REGION, M1.USR_ADDRESS, M1.AUTH_STATUS, M4.CERTIFICATE_TYPE, M4.IDENTIFY_TIME, M7.CARD_NO, M7.SUB_BRANCH FROM MPOMNG_MOBILE_MER_INF M1 LEFT JOIN PROVINCE M2 ON (M1.PROVINCE_ID = M2.PROVINCE_ID) LEFT JOIN CITY M3 ON (M3.CITY_ID = M1.CITY_ID) LEFT JOIN MPOMNG_MERIDENTIFY_INF M4 ON (M4.CUST_ID = M1.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN MPOMNG_AGE_CUST_REF_INF A ON (M1.CUST_ID=A.CUST_ID) LEFT JOIN MPRCS_CUST_LEVEL_INF M5 ON M5. LEVEL = M1.MERCLASS LEFT JOIN MPAMNG_AGENT_INF M6 ON (A.AGE_ID = M6.AGENT_ID) LEFT JOIN MPOMNG_CUST_BANK_INF M7 ON M7.CUST_ID = M1.CUST_ID AND M1.CUST_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custName},'%') AND M1.CUST_LOGIN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custLogin},'%') AND M1.CUST_STATUS = #{custStatus} AND M1.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND M6.AGENT_NAME = #{agentName} AND M1.IS_LOGIN_FLAG = #{isLoginFlag} AND M1.CUST_REG_DATETIME >= #{startTime} AND T1.CUST_REG_DATETIME <= #{endTime} AND M1.AUTH_STATUS = '2'
mapper.update: UPDATE MPOMNG_MOBILE_MER_INF CUST_STATUS = #{custStatus}, AUTH_STATUS = #{authStatus}, IS_LOGIN_FLAG = #{isLoginFlag}, CUST_PWD_NUM = #{custPwdNum} WHERE CUST_ID IN (${ids})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MPOMNG_MOBILE_MER_INF WHERE CUST_ID IN (${ids})
mapper.select: SELECT T1.MERCLASS AS CLASSID, COUNT(T1.MERCLASS) AS CNUM FROM MPOMNG_MOBILE_MER_INF T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN MPRCS_CUST_LEVEL_INF T2 ON(T1.MERCLASS=T2.LEVEL) WHERE T1.CUST_REG_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{date},'%') GROUP BY CLASSID
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNUM FROM MPOMNG_MOBILE_MER_INF WHERE CUST_REG_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{date},'%')
